subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The British heavyweight David Haye, who lost his World Boxing Association title to Vladimir Klitschko on Saturday, said he would reconsider his plan to retire after Klitschko offered a rematch.
snippet: The British heavyweight David Haye, who lost his World Boxing Association title to Vladimir Klitschko on Saturday, said he would reconsider his plan to retire after Klitschko offered a rematch.
